name: Prime Target
storyline: Who would risk killing a U.S. senator? To find out, you will fight hordes of deadly killers while assembling a variety of clues. Your search will take you to the center of the nation's power. In a furious rage of 3D shoot-'em-up action, you'll blast your way through the awe-inspiring corridors of the capitol, museums, and office buildings of Washington D.C. With the right amount of skill and luck, you might even stop the killers' insidious scheme!
summary: A powerful senator is brutally murdered while working late in her Washington D.C. office. In the game it is up to you to find her killers in this 3D action thriller of a game.
